Description.Text:
This 55 room luxury boutique hotel will provide the perfect home in Nolita - impeccable, attentive, stylish and all about you. They'll be your entree into a real New York neighborhood that is creative, cool, international and historic.Renowned restaurateur and chef Jimmy Bradley, who brought The Red Cate and The Harrison to New York, will create a unique dining experience at The Nolitan. The restaurant will serve breakfast, lunch and dinner and will provide hotel lobby lounge service and 24 hour in-room dining. Linger. Enjoy. Imagine. Ruminate. Make friends. Experience life like a Nolitan.
Facility Includes : - Valet parking $60/24hrs (fees subject to change) - Custom Bath and Body Products by Red Flower - 37" HD Flat Screen - Premium Entertainment and Gaming Systems - Complimentary Continental Breakfast - Complimentary Wi-Fi Internet Access - Complimentary Local and Toll-Free Phone - Complimentary daily newspaper - Evening turndown service - Private terrace - Luxury robes - iPod Stereo Systems by Vers - Complimentary Fitness Center - 24-hour concierge - 24-hour room service - Restaurant - Rooftop Lounge
- No triple or quad occupancy. - Unless notified prior to, or at check-in, a one night penalty will apply to departures that occur earlier than the date specified on the original reservation.
